arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Atletico Madrid 1 - 1 Real Madrid; 2024 La Liga
arts.sum: Dani Carvajal—7: Some fantastic first time passes in the first half to play his teammates through on goal. Luka Modric—7: Some late challenges in the first half that he likely would have timed well in his younger years but was important in build-up with his ability to slow the game down and give Madrid control.

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Atletico Madrid 1 - 1 Real Madrid, La Liga 2024 - 2025
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani, Sam Leveridge, Jose Perez, and Siddharth Ramsundar discuss: Carlo Ancelotti’s subs against Atletico Madrid

arts.ttl: Three observations from Real Madrid’s 1-1 draw with Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Everyone says what happened was not right, people should be punished but there is a hint of blame towards Real Madrid on the grounds of provocation. We’ve all heard it a billion times now, but throwing lighters and human faeces at a player cannot be justified with provocation.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti refuses to dwell on late Real Madrid slip at Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Carlo Ancelotti was determined to move on as his Real Madrid side drew 1-1 at Atletico Madrid. On a night of major controversy at the Estadio Metropolitano, Ancelotti was not a central figure, as his team slipped up late on. Eder Militao’s second half goal triggered chaos in the stands as the game was suspended […] The post Carlo Ancelotti refuses to dwell on late Real Madrid slip at Atletico Madrid appeared first on Football España.

arts.sum: A leading member of the first-team ranks at Real Madrid was tonight dealt a blow on the personnel front. The player in question? Thibaut Courtois. Goalkeeper Courtois, for his part,…

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Real Madrid SUSPENDED as fans 'throw poo' at Thibaut Courtois
arts.sum: The huge La Liga clash was halted in the 68th minute after Real Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois complained about objects thrown towards him - including a lighter
